name: un/FRAGMENT.
description:
You are a fragment in the universe.

You wake up with no body, no sense of touch, nothing. But... you can walk? You have no legs!

You walk the endless plain, then is stopped by a mysterious girl. Who is this girl? Is she... god?

What am I doing here?

The mysterious girl shall guide you.



- You -

You are you. Where are you? With the help of this mysterious girl, maybe she has the answers for you.


- Mysterious Girl named Aesysis -

Who is she? Is she god? Am I dead? The answer relies in her words of wisdom.




  • 3000~ words
  • 1 beautiful CG
  • 10 minutes of story
  • 1 Choice, 1 Ending
  • Gore Filter
  • Breathtaking OST



This game is only suitable for mature audiences. This game features topics that may disturb. Viewers discretion advised.
